meta.title: Alan Fernandes - Frontend Developer
meta.description: Hi, I'm Alan! I'm a frontend developer based in Curitiba, Brazil, experienced with UX and developing static websites.

about.title: about_me
about.content: I'm a front-end dev based in Curitiba, Brazil, and bachelor of design by the Federal University of Technology of Paraná. I have worked previously as an UX designer, but I have always been attracted to web development, having worked as a freelancing web developer for 5 years, designing landing pages and corporate websites. Not only that, but in my previous UX job I did a lot of more technical work, like project documentation, and information architecture — I even got to design an API. This background in UX allows me to seamlessly bridge the gap between design and development, ensuring that the design is implemented in it's tiniest details, and that I can efficiently communicate with the design team when changes are needed.

skills.title: my_skills
skills.content: From my experience developing static websites, I have a very strong knowledge of HTML and CSS (I prefer using SCSS) and vanilla JS. More recently, I started delving into Nuxt (Vue) and Astro for website development, and React for dynamic applications.

project1.title: heros_tavern
project1.description: An app with character prompts for tabletop RPGs, that dynamically creates backgrounds and lets the user chat with the character using Open AI's API.

project2.title: twilight_ui
project2.description: A mod for FoundryVTT that overhauls the UI and bring a many user experience improvements.

project3.title: track_it
